quests.name: The Great Maui
objectives: Go see Moana. She'll help you learn about Maui.
Free Moana's Canoe by clearing the 8 sea debris behind it.
Go tell Maui about your exploits.

quests.name: A Feast Worthy Of A Demigod
objectives: Prepare Maui 3 meals with at least a 3-star rating.
Unlock the Dazzle Beach Biome in the Village.
Place the Peaceful Grotto in water.
Make sure Maui has everything he needs.
Everything is ready for Maui. Welcome him to the Village.
Maui is in the Village. See what he thinks of Dreamlight Valley.
